CustomField.description: Config is used to control the saving of timecard with zero hours. If it is true, timecards with zero are saved else not saved(warning will be shown on ui).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Config is used to control the saving of timecard with zero hours. If it is true, timecards with zero are saved else not saved(warning will be shown on ui).
CustomField.label: Save timecard with zero hours
